links.body: The Tales of Ba Sing Se

paragraphs.body: A dog is a non-hybrid ${link_0} that inhabits the ${link_1}. Dogs are tamable and come in multiple breeds.
paragraphs.text: A dog is a non-hybrid canine that inhabits the Earth Kingdom. Dogs are tamable and come in multiple breeds.

paragraphs.body: While taking a vacation at the ${link_0}, ${link_1} found a dog licking the deteriorated iceberg.
paragraphs.text: While taking a vacation at the Misty Palms Oasis, Team Avatar found a dog licking the deteriorated iceberg.

paragraphs.body: Some time later, a dog and its ${link_0} were at ${link_1}, awaiting ${link_2} to Ba Sing Se.
paragraphs.text: Some time later, a dog and its owners were at Full Moon Bay, awaiting transportation to Ba Sing Se.

paragraphs.body: When ${link_0} ${link_1} reconstructed the ${link_2} outside the city walls, he used his ${link_3} to call for the zoo animals but accidentally also called in multiple domesticated creatures, among them a dog, which ended up in an ${link_4}'s pen.
paragraphs.text: When Avatar Aang reconstructed the the zoo outside the city walls, he used his bison whistle to call for the zoo animals but accidentally also called in multiple domesticated creatures, among them a dog, which ended up in an elephant mandrill's pen.

paragraphs.body: The canine that was present at the oasis had black fur with a brown underbelly. It had a light brown muzzle and white paws, and the end of its tail was a beige color.
paragraphs.text: The canine that was present at the oasis had black fur with a brown underbelly. It had a light brown muzzle and white paws, and the end of its tail was a beige color.

paragraphs.body: Another breed of dog in Ba Sing Se was brown-furred. It had tiny paws and long floppy ears that fell down the sides of its head. Its face contained light brown features and golden-colored, droopy eyes.
paragraphs.text: Another breed of dog in Ba Sing Se was brown-furred. It had tiny paws and long floppy ears that fell down the sides of its head. Its face contained light brown features and golden-colored, droopy eyes.

paragraphs.body: The dog which inhabited the Misty Palms Oasis is similar to a Bernese Mountain dog, though it is thinner and has less hair. It also bears a resemblance to the Appenzeller Sennenhund.
paragraphs.text: The dog which inhabited the Misty Palms Oasis is similar to a Bernese Mountain dog, though it is thinner and has less hair. It also bears a resemblance to the Appenzeller Sennenhund.
